data.text: @KJORielly @DrZoeHyde Find it hard to take anything from the CDC a valid, given their political handling over the past 2 years.

@DrZoeHyde I love how at the end you acknowledge the whole study is flawed while pretending the conclusions it reached are valid.  This stud has been debunked and you know it.  I think people like you afraid of being irrelevant again.  Stop with your fear mongering with fake studies.
@DrZoeHyde Masks helped with delta, but didnt do shit with Omicron. Stop equating the two as the same
@DrZoeHyde Mask verywhere. My regional town has gone up from 71 to 125 active cases in a week.

@DrZoeHyde @cingolani_oscar Las máscaras en lo niños afecta el desarrollo cognitivo, social y emocional. Perjudica la lectoescritura. Qué problema hay que circule un virus que no los afecta de manera grave?  Kids must not wear masks.
@christina_varga @DrZoeHyde @parentaction4ed @tdsb there was NEVER any evidence to mandate them in the first place https://t.co/O2hLkBou5Y

@DrZoeHyde @2021Mamabear123 More than 150 Comparative Studies and Articles on #Mask Ineffectiveness and Harms

https://t.co/O2hLkBou5Y
@MelpomeneMel @DrZoeHyde And for Dutch policy makers... The list is long!
